author: Ground AI
title: Ground News - Man who died with wife and son in Alberta lake wasn’t a risk-taker, says friend
text:
Left Center Right
Bias Insights
Bias Insights An Edmonton man, his wife, and their eight-year-old son died after their utility terrain vehicle went into a lake, raising questions about their familiarity with the area. Authorities found their bodies and the vehicle in an area with thin ice near Alexis Bridge. Friends remember the couple as adventurous and friendly individuals who enjoyed outdoor activities, such as snowmobiling.
Insights by Ground AI
